dotnetType.name: DoubleSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DoubleSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new double serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
An action that accepts an object and a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and writes the serialized
            object to the stream.

overloads.summary: Builds a double serializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated serializers should use for write operations.

returns.summary: Whether the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DoubleSchema" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.

returns.summary: Always true; this case will apply but fail if no conversion exists to <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DoubleSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
